items.content_html: Link-Shrink is a powerful, lightweight URL shortener designed to streamline and simplify your links. items.content_html: KaliPHP is a fast, lightweight PHP framework. In an age where frameworks are a dime a dozen, We believe that KaliPHP will stand out in the crowd. It will do this by combining all the things you love about the great frameworks out there, while getting rid of the bad.
